eksath janapadaye yuddha siduwu sandarbhaya saha lankawe siwil yuddhaye sandarbhaya dekak bawa pahadiliyi.eeka ehema nowana bawa kisiwiteka kiya naha.eheth samaja aarthika mulayak sahitha prashna sambandhawa me degollangema praweshaye thibunu samyathwayayi me mathukerenne.dan obe tharkaya wanne eksath janapadaya thama ratin pita yuddhayakata sambandha wu nisa eya waradiyi lankawe aanduwa rata "thula" yuddhayak sidukala nisa ehi waradak naha wage ekak.
